field.name: cycleSpecId
field.remark: It is recommended to keep the field for there can be multiple customized specifications.

field.name: description
field.remark: A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this component.

field.name: billingDateShift
field.remark: An offset of a billing date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the Billing Period.

field.name: creditDateOffset
field.remark: An offset of a balance deduction date which can be seen as write-off date after bill running.The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

field.name: mailingDateOffset
field.remark: An offset of a customer bill mailing date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

field.name: paymentDueDateOffset
field.remark: An offset of a payment due date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.
